p: The decrease in the influenza-positive rate at the beginning of 2020 may be due to the COVID-19 outbreak or other reasons, such as the environment [ 11, 12] and the high level of herd immunity to influenza H3N2 viruses (since the positive rate always decreased when a subtype/lineage reached a relatively high level). Since January 23rd, China has undertaken public health interventions, the cordon sanitaire, and controls on travel, which also limited the transmission of influenza between districts. Meanwhile, the Chinese people are taking self-protection measures such as wearing masks, washing hands frequently, and staying at home. These prophylactic measures also significantly reduced the transmission of influenza and made this flu season reach a low status much earlier than regular seasons.
